arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِهٖ حَتّٰى يَرَوُا الْعَذَابَ الْاَلِيْمَ
transliteration_en: Laa yu'minoona bihee hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem
translation_en: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.
translation_id: Mereka tidak akan beriman kepadanya hingga melihat azab yang pedih.

transliteration_en: Fayaatiyahum baghtatanw wa hum laa yash'uroon
transliteration_id: Fa ya'tiyahum bagtataw wa hum lā yasy‘urūn(a).
translation_en: And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not.
translation_id: Maka, datanglah ia (azab) kepada mereka secara tiba-tiba, sedangkan mereka tidak menyadarinya.

translation_en: And they will say, "May we be reprieved?"
translation_id: Lalu, mereka berkata, “Apakah kami diberi penangguhan waktu?”

translation_en: So for Our punishment are they impatient?
translation_id: Bukankah mereka yang meminta agar azab Kami disegerakan?

translation_en: Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years
translation_id: Bagaimana pendapatmu jika kepada mereka Kami berikan kenikmatan hidup beberapa tahun?

translation_en: And then there came to them that which they were promised?
translation_id: Kemudian, ia (azab) yang diancamkan datang kepada mereka.

arabic: مَآ اَغْنٰى عَنْهُمْ مَّا كَانُوْا يُمَتَّعُوْنَ ۗ
translation_en: They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided.
translation_id: Niscaya kenikmatan yang mereka rasakan tidak berguna baginya.

arabic: وَمَآ اَهْلَكْنَا مِنْ قَرْيَةٍ اِلَّا لَهَا مُنْذِرُوْنَ ۖ
transliteration_en: Wa maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa lahaa munziroon
transliteration_id: Wa mā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā munżirūn(a).
translation_en: And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners
translation_id: Kami tidak membinasakan suatu negeri, kecuali setelah ada pemberi peringatan kepadanya.

translation_en: As a reminder; and never have We been unjust.
translation_id: (Hal itu) sebagai peringatan. Kami sekali-kali bukanlah orang-orang zalim.

translation_en: And the devils have not brought the revelation down.
translation_id: (Al-Qur’an) itu tidaklah dibawa turun oleh setan-setan.

transliteration_en: Wa maa yambaghee lahum wa maa yastatee'oon
transliteration_id: Wa mā yambagī lahum wa mā yastaṭī‘ūn(a).
translation_en: It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.
translation_id: Tidaklah pantas bagi mereka (membawa turun Al-Qur’an itu) dan mereka pun tidak akan sanggup.

translation_en: Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya mereka (setan-setan) benar-benar dijauhkan (dari berita langit).

arabic: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ اللّٰهِ اِلٰهًا اٰخَرَ فَتَكُوْنَ مِنَ الْمُعَذَّبِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Falaa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fatakoona minal mu'azzabeen
transliteration_id: Falā tad‘u ma‘allāhi ilāhan ākhara fa takūna minal-mu‘ażżabīn(a).
translation_en: So do not invoke with Allah another deity and [thus] be among the punished.
translation_id: Maka, janganlah engkau (Nabi Muhammad) menyembah Tuhan lain bersama Allah. Nanti kamu termasuk orang-orang yang diazab.

translation_en: And warn, [O Muhammad], your closest kindred.
translation_id: Berilah peringatan kepada keluargamu yang terdekat.

arabic: وَاخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ اتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Wakhfid janaahaka limanit taba 'aka minal mu'mineen
translation_en: And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers.
translation_id: Rendahkanlah hatimu terhadap orang-orang yang mengikutimu, yaitu orang-orang mukmin.

arabic: فَاِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ اِنِّيْ بَرِيْۤءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُوْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Fa in asawka faqul innee bareee'um mimmmaa ta'maloon
transliteration_id: Fa in ‘aṣauka faqul innī barī'um mimmā ta‘malūn(a).
translation_en: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing."
translation_id: Jika mereka mendurhakaimu, katakanlah, “Sesungguhnya aku tidak bertanggung jawab terhadap apa yang kamu kerjakan.”

translation_en: And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
translation_id: Bertawakallah kepada (Allah) Yang Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Penyayang.

translation_en: Who sees you when you arise
translation_id: (Dia) yang melihat ketika engkau berdiri (untuk salat).

translation_en: And your movement among those who prostrate.
translation_id: Dan, (melihat) perubahan gerakan badanmu di antara orang-orang yang sujud.

translation_en: Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Dialah Yang Maha Mendengar lagi Maha Mengetahui.

arabic: هَلْ اُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلٰى مَنْ تَنَزَّلُ الشَّيٰطِيْنُ ۗ
translation_en: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?
translation_id: Maukah Aku beritakan kepadamu, kepada siapa setan-setan itu turun?

translation_en: They descend upon every sinful liar.
translation_id: Mereka (setan) turun kepada setiap pendusta lagi banyak berdosa.

translation_en: They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars.
translation_id: Mereka menyampaikan hasil pendengarannya, sedangkan kebanyakan mereka adalah para pendusta.

translation_en: And the poets - [only] the deviators follow them;
translation_id: Para penyair itu diikuti oleh orang-orang yang sesat.

arabic: اَلَمْ تَرَ اَنَّهُمْ فِيْ كُلِّ وَادٍ يَّهِيْمُوْنَ ۙ
transliteration_en: Alam tara annahum fee kulli waadiny yaheemoon
transliteration_id: Alam tara annahum fī kulli wādiy yahīmūn(a).
translation_en: Do you not see that in every valley they roam
translation_id: Tidakkah engkau melihat bahwa mereka merambah setiap lembah kepalsuan

transliteration_en: Wa annahum yaqooloona ma laa yaf'aloon
transliteration_id: Wa annahum yaqūlūna mā lā yaf‘alūn(a).
translation_en: And that they say what they do not do? -
translation_id: dan bahwa mereka mengatakan apa yang mereka sendiri tidak mengerjakan(-nya)?

arabic: اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ وَذَكَرُوا اللّٰهَ كَثِيْرًا وَّانْتَصَرُوْا مِنْۢ بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوْا ۗوَسَيَعْلَمُ الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْٓا اَيَّ مُنْقَلَبٍ يَّنْقَلِبُوْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Illal lazeena aamanoo w a'amilus saalihaati wa zakarul laaha kaseeranw wantasaroo mim ba'di maa zulimoo; wa saya'lamul lazeena zalamooo aiya munqalbiny yanqaliboon
transliteration_id: Illal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa żakarullāha kaṡīraw wantaṣarū mim ba‘di mā ẓulimū, wa saya‘lamul-lażīna ẓalamū ayya munqalabiy yanqalibūn(a).
translation_en: Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah often and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what [kind of] return they will be returned.
translation_id: Kecuali (para penyair) yang beriman, beramal saleh, banyak mengingat Allah, dan bangkit membela (kebenaran) setelah terzalimi. Orang-orang yang zalim kelak akan mengetahui ke mana mereka akan kembali.
